---
title: "Cholorphyll *a* filtering"
output: 
  html_document:
    css: "style.css"
---

Follow the procedures for [TSS filtering](https://smr-monitoring.github.io/sop/tss.html) with the following modifications:

* The filter does not need to be pre-muffled, pre-weighed, or numbered.
* The filter does not need to be muffled after drying and weighing.
